subject: Collaboration
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team ?

My name is Jean Manche, I’m a simracing content creator specialized in
rally.
I currently have over 20,000 followers on TikTok, and my live streams
gather between 500 and 1,000 concurrent viewers on average.

My audience is very attentive to the equipment I use. During my streams, I
have a dedicated camera focused on my pedals, which means your Simsonn Pro
X Ultra pedals would be constantly showcased live in front of a highly
engaged community.

I’ve built a strong trust relationship with my viewers, and I truly believe
your pedals would attract a lot of attention thanks to their impressive
build quality, precision, and realistic feel.

I’d love to collaborate with you, whether through a product showcase,
long-term partnership, or immersive content collaboration, to help more
simracers experience Simsonn’s technology.

I’d be happy to share more detailed stats and discuss any format of
collaboration that suits your needs.

Thank you for your time and consideration ?
Best regards,
Jean Manche
? Simracing Content Creator – Rally Specialist
? TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@jean_manche?_t=ZN-90Z5ho6FqMA&_r=1
